snippet: Scrabble’s national championship tournament was shaken by the disqualification of one young player for pocketing blank tiles in an attempt to cheat.
abstract: Competitive Scrabble’s national championship tournament is shaken by the disqualification of one young player for pocketing blank tiles in an attempt to cheat.
lead_paragraph: Scrabble’s national championship tournament was shaken by the disqualification of one young player for pocketing blank tiles in an attempt to cheat.

headline.seo: Scrabble Community Rocked by Cheating at Tournament
headline.main: Even in a Scrabble Match, ‘Cheat’ Is a 4-Letter Word
headline.print_headline: Even in a Scrabble Match, ‘Cheat’ Is a 4-Letter Word
